name: Hardwood Hearts
description:
Join the GREATEST HEARTS COMMUNITY in the world and play with thousands of online players or just play solo.

Hardwood Hearts breathes new life into your favorite card game with excellent graphics. Enjoy calming Hearts playing environments with ocean waves breaking in the distance.

Play with players from around the world or with family and friends.

Check out where you stand with the online leader board. Enjoy achievement challenges that take the experience from just a single game of hearts to even more fun.

Hardwood Hearts is customizable with new backgrounds, cards, player avatars and tables that can be added to the game via paid downloadable content.

Hearts game variations included in Hardwood Hearts:
• Partnership (traditional)
• Individual (singles)
• Spot Hearts
• Timed games
